function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning of PCR equipment leading to contamination of samples","Impact":"Misinterpretation of test results, incorrect conclusions, and potential spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning protocols for PCR equipment, use of certified nucleic-acid free water, and regular validation of cleaning procedures","Technologies":"PCR machines with self-cleaning functionality, UV light sterilization, and use of certified nucleic-acid free water","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and personnel handling PCR equipment","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institutions, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Inaccurate temperature control during PCR process leading to compromised amplification","Impact":"Inconsistent and unreliable test results, potentially leading to misdiagnosis and mistreatment","Mitigation":"Use of high-quality PCR machines with precise temperature control and regular calibration, implementation of temperature monitoring systems, and training on proper temperature control procedures","Technologies":"PCR machines with precise temperature control, automated temperature monitoring systems, and real-time temperature sensors","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and personnel responsible for PCR processes","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institutions, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate handling of amplified products leading to cross-contamination","Impact":"Misinterpretation of test results, contamination of subsequent samples, and potential spread of disease","Mitigation":"Strict handling protocols for amplified products, use of designated work areas, and regular training on proper handling procedures","Technologies":"Laminar flow hoods, PCR workstations with HEPA filters, and use of disposable gloves and protective gear","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and personnel handling amplified products","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institutions, and regulatory bodies"}]}
